resources.string: Do you want to exit this app?

These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the "\"USA Phone Number Generator"\"" mobile application (the "App"). By using the App, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using the App.
The App is designed for the sole purpose of generating phone numbers and allowing users to import them to their device. Any use of the App beyond these specified functions is strictly prohibited.

1. You agree not to misuse or abuse the App, including but not limited to engaging in any activities that could harm the functionality, security, or integrity of the App.\n2. You may not use the generated phone numbers for any illegal or unethical purposes.\n3. Sharing the generated phone numbers with third parties is prohibited without prior consent from the owner of the App.
Raging Flame Creations is the sole owner of all intellectual property rights, including trademarks and copyrights, associated with the App.

Raging Flame Creations reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to the App if you violate these Terms and Conditions, including but not limited to any misuse of the App or failure to adhere to our user obligations.

The App is intended for educational purposes only. Raging Flame Creations cannot be held responsible for any issues or consequences arising from the use of the App, including but not limited to the accuracy of generated phone numbers or their suitability for any particular purpose. Users assume all risks and responsibilities associated with the use of the App.\n

These Terms are subject to change at any time, and it is your responsibility to review them periodically for updates. Raging Flame Creations reserves the right to make changes to these Terms without prior notice.\n\nBy continuing to use the App, you acknowledge and accept these Terms and Conditions.
